titles.title: Drug Testing Integrity Act of 2013
Drug Testing Integrity Act of 2013
To prohibit the manufacture, marketing, sale, or shipment in interstate commerce of products designed to assist in defrauding a drug test.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Manufacturing, and Trade.

bill.summary:
Drug Testing Integrity Act of 2013 - Makes it unlawful to knowingly manufacture, market, sell, ship, or otherwise provide to another individual any product with the intent to assist such individual to use such product to defraud a drug test.
Treats a violation of this Act as an unfair or deceptive act or practice under the Federal Trade Commission Act.
